title: NFTreviewer00
author: NFTreviewer00
content: *BARFIGHT TOKEN**Blow off steam in the metaverse, own your NFT character and knock some teeth out to earn crypto!**The launch is confirmed for 7:30PM UTC time Monday 26 September*$BFIGHT token is set to take the metaverse market by storm. This is virtual barfights! Design your patron‚Äôs attire whether it be a wife beater singlet or suit, select your weapon of choice from bottles to tasers and get swinging ‚Äì winner takes all!**The BAR FIGHTS 2023 game** is scheduled for release for both PC and VR in Q1 2023 and will include 3 metaverse scenes ‚Äì the bar, a carpark, and a smoking area. Each will be unique in its design and interactivity. **Players will be able to complete in several modes:**- üëäüèº 1 v 1 (P2P)- üî™ 10 V 10 (team)- üî´ 1 V 10 (single player) modes- üèÜ 100 V 100 (battle royal)**Marketing**- Massive influencers - CMC & CG Listings right after the launch!- Dextools trending- UFC, MMA Boxers to promote BarfightMore and more‚Ä¶**Website:** https://barfight.io/**Twitter:** https://twitter.com/BarFightToken**Telegram:** https://t.me/BarfightTokenOfficial**Contract:** https://etherscan.io/token/0x6b91b72931993449fecC9d590D0d786a41588b1E

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: If this is the official announcement then you should move it to the announcement section this is for altcoin discussion in general, can you name influencers on board this project I don't see any name on the homepage, this is not the kind of project I will get into, there's no usage and platform is not what the community is looking for this is going to be a short live project and will eventually die, I have seen this kind projects so many times in the announcement and its only a matter of time before they are gone, sorry for being brutally frank just want to save people for their hard earned money

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: I looked through the whitepaper of this project, which consists of 6 pictures and did not get any useful information for myself. Why is there no information about team members and early investors of the project? This is important information for those who decide to invest in your project.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on September 26, 2022, 12:16:27 PMI looked through the whitepaper of this project, which consists of 6 pictures and did not get any useful information for myself. Why is there no information about team members and early investors of the project? This is important information for those who decide to invest in your project. Because projects like this don't have any organised team members that handles the projects. From the look of it, this a quick money pump and dump project for short term only.Don't be surprised those six pictures does not actually represent any team member in the project. These type of project are not worthy of consideration.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: can you share who is the influencers that join on this project?i try to search the influencers that join this project but i don't see anyone posting about this even the launch already near.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 26, 2022, 01:53:02 PM...From the look of it, this a quick money pump and dump project for short term only...I am confused by the fact that the coin is launched in the Ethereum ERC20 blockchain, although I have seen from experience that such coins aimed at pumping money are most often launched in BSC and Poligon, since this requires less financial costs.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Some dubious project offering me to buy tokens on Uniswap, via ETH swap. Tokenomics implies 80% of the entire supply in the Uniswap pool. There are no advisors, investors, etc. That is, almost all the supply will be concentrated on one exchange. What are the prospects of development of the project with such tokenomics, which keeps almost all its proposal in pool of one exchange and offers there to buy tokens in unlimited quantities? In my opinion, almost none. There are a lot of such projects that appear on DEX exchanges, but they die very quickly.

comments.author: NFTreviewer00
comments.body: Get in the telegram for more info! It is just launched and going well. Cmc & Cg listings coming up
